sentences.en: a photograph of my mother sitting astride a horse
sentences.cn: 我母亲骑在马上的一张照片

sentences.en: As one sits astride a black unicorn.
Astride the merry - go - round the baby yelled with rapture.
sentences.cn: 孩子骑在旋转 木马 上,兴奋地大喊大叫.

sentences.en: Bruce engaged low gear and drove at a terrifying speed, keeping the front wheels astride the crack as he followed its zig - zag course.
sentences.cn: 布鲁斯接通了低速挡,开车速度快得令人害怕; 他在使前轮分跨地裂的同时曲曲折折地前进.

sentences.en: Cengang Bridge, 793 meters astride Cengang waterway, connecting Cengang and Lidiao Isle.
sentences.cn: 岑港大桥跨越岑港水道, 连接本岛的岑港和里钓岛, 全长793米.

sentences.en: Heavy - coated policemen astride noble horses.
sentences.cn: 重装的警察骑着名贵的马匹.

sentences.en: I was vaguely astride the only horse.
sentences.cn: 我象腾云驾雾似地跨在仅有的一匹马上.

sentences.en: Ladies ride horses by sitting astride or side - saddle.
sentences.cn: 女子骑马可以跨骑也可以坐横鞍.

sentences.en: Napoleon astride the early 19 th century like a giant.
sentences.cn: 拿破仑像个巨人跨越19世纪初叶.

sentences.en: Severe - looking policemen sat astride noble horses.
sentences.cn: 脸色严峻的警察骑在名贵的马匹上.

sentences.en: That pretty girl rode astride the horse.
sentences.cn: 那位漂亮的小姑娘两腿叉开骑在马上.

sentences.en: The naughty boy was sitting astride of the house - roof.
sentences.cn: 那个顽皮的男孩跨坐在屋脊上.

sentences.en: The town lies astride the River Howard.
sentences.cn: 城镇位在霍华德河的两旁.

sentences.en: To sit or stand on with the legs astride; straddle.
sentences.cn: 跨坐两腿分开跨坐或站; 跨坐.

trans.tran_en: with one leg on each side of something
